issue.title: [Python] Cannot installed pyarrow==3.0.0 for macos monterey(12.2)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15686](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15686). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are currently no wheels available in pypi python3.6 or 3.8 for macos monterey(12.2). This means it's not possible to install versions 3.0.0 of arrow from pypi as the latest uploaded source release is 7.0.0

It would also be useful to upload source releases to pypi...
